name: Me, Mom and bad toys
description:
This game is still under development

you are now in old toys land..every toy ever left behind, thrown away or just neglected by hi/her owner is in this world, Adam and his mom found themselves trapper in this world but they discovered that they are just sad toys that need to be fixed .

Each toy has a weak point you have to figure out in order to fix them so they can be HAPPY AGAIN!! :

Use R to release the baby, you'll need his help maybe to fix some toys or get items that might be difficult for you to reach but remember he won't go far without his mommy!

Hints:notice some toys are with one eye hmmm maybe you can caught them by surprise..others may look as good as new, they could longing for play time with a child.
